thread.title: What's the delay over our marriage tax allowance?

author: Jessica Gorst-Wiliams
title: What's the delay over our marriage tax allowance?
text: Tax What's the delay over our marriage tax allowance? A reader is awaiting confirmation from HMRC over the transfer of part of her personal allowance to her husband People who have registered their interest in the new marriage allowance will be invited to apply through HMRC's digital service By Jessica Gorst-Wiliams
